sourcesContent:
import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import axios from 'axios' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' function Update(props) { const id=props.match.params.id; const [user, setUser] = useState({ name:'',roll:0,branch:'',mail:'',mob:0,year:0 }) useEffect(() => { async function fetchAPI() { await axios.get('http://localhost:8080/users/'+id) .then((data)=> { user=setUser(data.data[0]); console.log(user.name); }) .catch((err)=>console.log("oh"+err)) } fetchAPI(); }, []) return (
Name setUser({...user,name:e.target.value})}/> We'll never share your email with anyone else. Roll No. setUser({...user,roll:e.target.value})}/> Year of Graduation setUser({...user,year:e.target.value})}/> Email setUser({...user,mail:e.target.value})}/> Mobile No. setUser({...user,mob:e.target.value})}/>
) } export default Update
